This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe Ship just appeared, Its lights were red. But once it got in to a random house. The lights begin flicking yellow. Then it permanently turned yellow. Then a green beam came out of the bottom. A green light emitted from the house's windows. I checked the house for any lifeforms. they was long gone. The next day they was back. ((The humans)). I noticed it by it making a Loud whooosh sound (Maybe coming from a wormhole or something) When the green beam came out. a large noise occurred. (It sounded like a Car hitting another car, with a explosion). The ship then mysteriously vanished. Most likely use of a cloaking device.
